title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 June 2014 - XWiki

09:51 <vmassol> tmortagne: good morning  
09:52 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
09:52 <vmassol> I think you' might be taking too high risks for 6.1RC1 by upgrading all those frameworks… I'd have waited for 6.2M1 personally ;)  
09:59 <tmortagne> it's all bugfix releases  
09:59 <tmortagne> especially for reflection, we should not stay on RC1 when there is a RC2  
10:08 <vmassol> commons collection 4 is a bugfix release? :)  
10:08 <tmortagne> we are not really using it yet  
10:08 <vmassol> btw do they have a new package name like they did for commons lang?  
10:08 <tmortagne> I just aded it in commons pom  
10:08 <tmortagne> yes they did it properly  
10:08 <vmassol> ok cool  
10:09 <tmortagne> it seems to be a rule in apache commons  
10:09 <tmortagne> they did the same in httpclient  
10:09 <vmassol> there's no such rule really but they copy it from one another  
10:09 <vmassol> which is good :)  
10:10 <vmassol> (each project is free to manage its own rules at apache)
